remarks:
A wff may be existentially quantified with a variable not free in it. Theorem 19.9 of [Margaris] p. 89.  See ~ 19.9v for a version requiring fewer axioms.  (Contributed by FL, 24-Mar-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2016.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 30-Dec-2017.)
